messages.content: Rosy Ansell, a classroom assistant, discusses her support for Julian Huppert due to his efforts in securing better funding for local schools and his consistent delivery on education policies in Cambridge.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Julian Huppert aims to bring about change, with schools in Cambridge receiving an extra £2.3 million each year. He supports more one-to-one tuition, additional equipment, and opportunities for extra school trips, ensuring every child benefits from this extra investment.

issues.education: Julian Huppert has consistently delivered better outcomes for schools locally and nationally. He has secured better funding for local schools in Cambridge, resulting in an extra £2.3 million each year.

contactInformation.address: 16 Signet Court Swann's Road Cambridge CB5 8LA

endorsements.endorsement: Supports Julian Huppert for his work and commitment to improving education in Cambridge.

quotes.text: But actions speak louder than words, and Julian has consistently delivered here in Cambridge.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Rosy Ansell, a classroom assistant, is seen endorsing Julian Huppert, praising his focus on education and efforts to secure better school funding in Cambridge.
